content:
TITLE: Gobuster Directory Mode Command-Line Options
DESCRIPTION: Complete command-line options for Gobuster's directory/file enumeration mode, showing all available flags and their descriptions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Uses directory/file enumeration mode

Usage:
  gobuster dir [flags]

Flags:
  -f, --add-slash                       Append / to each request
  -c, --cookies string                  Cookies to use for the requests
  -d, --discover-backup                 Also search for backup files by appending multiple backup extensions
      --exclude-length ints             exclude the following content length (completely ignores the status). Supply multiple times to exclude multiple sizes.
  -e, --expanded                        Expanded mode, print full URLs
  -x, --extensions string               File extension(s) to search for
  -r, --follow-redirect                 Follow redirects
  -H, --headers stringArray             Specify HTTP headers, -H 'Header1: val1' -H 'Header2: val2'
  -h, --help                            help for dir
      --hide-length                     Hide the length of the body in the output
  -m, --method string                   Use the following HTTP method (default "GET")
  -n, --no-status                       Don't print status codes
  -k, --no-tls-validation               Skip TLS certificate verification
  -P, --password string                 Password for Basic Auth
      --proxy string                    Proxy to use for requests [http(s)://host:port]
      --random-agent                    Use a random User-Agent string
      --retry                           Should retry on request timeout
      --retry-attempts int              Times to retry on request timeout (default 3)
  -s, --status-codes string             Positive status codes (will be overwritten with status-codes-blacklist if set)
  -b, --status-codes-blacklist string   Negative status codes (will override status-codes if set) (default "404")
      --timeout duration                HTTP Timeout (default 10s)
  -u, --url string                      The target URL
  -a, --useragent string                Set the User-Agent string (default "gobuster/3.2.0")
  -U, --username string                 Username for Basic Auth

Global Flags:
      --delay duration    Time each thread waits between requests (e.g. 1500ms)
      --no-color          Disable color output
      --no-error          Don't display errors
  -z, --no-progress       Don't display progress
  -o, --output string     Output file to write results to (defaults to stdout)
  -p, --pattern string    File containing replacement patterns
  -q, --quiet             Don't print the banner and other noise
  -t, --threads int       Number of concurrent threads (default 10)
  -v, --verbose           Verbose output (errors)
  -w, --wordlist string   Path to the wordlist
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Directory Enumeration with Gobuster
DESCRIPTION: Example of basic directory scanning with custom parameters including cookie, threads and file extensions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dir -u https://mysite.com/path/to/folder -c 'session=123456' -t 50 -w common-files.txt -x .php,.html
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing Basic DNS Subdomain Enumeration with Gobuster
DESCRIPTION: Basic command for DNS subdomain enumeration with Gobuster using a wordlist of common subdomain names and 50 concurrent threads.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dns -d mysite.com -t 50 -w common-names.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Normal DNS Subdomain Enumeration Run with Output
DESCRIPTION: Standard subdomain enumeration against google.com showing the complete output including discovered subdomains.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dns -d google.com -w ~/wordlists/subdomains.txt

===============================================================
Gobuster v3.2.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================
[+] Mode         : dns
[+] Url/Domain   : google.com
[+] Threads      : 10
[+] Wordlist     : /home/oj/wordlists/subdomains.txt
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:54:20 Starting gobuster
===============================================================
Found: chrome.google.com
Found: ns1.google.com
Found: admin.google.com
Found: www.google.com
Found: m.google.com
Found: support.google.com
Found: translate.google.com
Found: cse.google.com
Found: news.google.com
Found: music.google.com
Found: mail.google.com
Found: store.google.com
Found: mobile.google.com
Found: search.google.com
Found: wap.google.com
Found: directory.google.com
Found: local.google.com
Found: blog.google.com
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:54:20 Finished
===============================================================
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Default Gobuster Directory Scan
DESCRIPTION: Standard directory scan output showing default configuration and discovered endpoints with status codes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dir -u https://buffered.io -w ~/wordlists/shortlist.txt

===============================================================

/contact (Status: 301)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: DNS Subdomain Enumeration with IP Addresses
DESCRIPTION: Subdomain enumeration with the -i flag to display IP addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6) for discovered subdomains.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dns -d google.com -w ~/wordlists/subdomains.txt -i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Virtual Host Discovery with Gobuster
DESCRIPTION: Example of using Gobuster's vhost mode to discover virtual hosts on a target domain.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster vhost -u https://mysite.com -w common-vhosts.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Fuzzing with Gobuster
DESCRIPTION: Example of using Gobuster's fuzzing mode to test parameters in a URL.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster fuzz -u https://example.com?FUZZ=test -w parameter-names.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster S3 Mode Options
DESCRIPTION: Command-line options and flags for using Gobuster in S3 bucket enumeration mode. Includes both mode-specific and global flags for customizing the enumeration process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Uses aws bucket enumeration mode

Usage:
  gobuster s3 [flags]

Flags:
  -h, --help                 help for s3
  -m, --maxfiles int         max files to list when listing buckets (only shown in verbose mode) (default 5)
  -k, --no-tls-validation    Skip TLS certificate verification
      --proxy string         Proxy to use for requests [http(s)://host:port]
      --random-agent         Use a random User-Agent string
      --retry                Should retry on request timeout
      --retry-attempts int   Times to retry on request timeout (default 3)
      --timeout duration     HTTP Timeout (default 10s)
  -a, --useragent string     Set the User-Agent string (default "gobuster/3.2.0")

Global Flags:
      --delay duration    Time each thread waits between requests (e.g. 1500ms)
      --no-color          Disable color output
      --no-error          Don't display errors
  -z, --no-progress       Don't display progress
  -o, --output string     Output file to write results to (defaults to stdout)
  -p, --pattern string    File containing replacement patterns
  -q, --quiet             Don't print the banner and other noise
  -t, --threads int       Number of concurrent threads (default 10)
  -v, --verbose           Verbose output (errors)
  -w, --wordlist string   Path to the wordlist
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster GCS Mode Options
DESCRIPTION: Command-line options and flags for using Gobuster in GCS bucket enumeration mode. Includes both mode-specific and global flags for customizing the enumeration process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_21

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Uses gcs bucket enumeration mode

Usage:
  gobuster gcs [flags]

Flags:
  -h, --help                 help for gcs
  -m, --maxfiles int         max files to list when listing buckets (only shown in verbose mode) (default 5)
  -k, --no-tls-validation    Skip TLS certificate verification
      --proxy string         Proxy to use for requests [http(s)://host:port]
      --random-agent         Use a random User-Agent string
      --retry                Should retry on request timeout
      --retry-attempts int   Times to retry on request timeout (default 3)
      --timeout duration     HTTP Timeout (default 10s)
  -a, --useragent string     Set the User-Agent string (default "gobuster/3.2.0")

Global Flags:
      --delay duration    Time each thread waits between requests (e.g. 1500ms)
      --no-color          Disable color output
      --no-error          Don't display errors
  -z, --no-progress       Don't display progress
  -o, --output string     Output file to write results to (defaults to stdout)
  -p, --pattern string    File containing replacement patterns
  -q, --quiet             Don't print the banner and other noise
  -t, --threads int       Number of concurrent threads (default 10)
  -v, --verbose           Verbose output (errors)
  -w, --wordlist string   Path to the wordlist
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster TFTP Mode Options
DESCRIPTION: Command-line options and flags for using Gobuster in TFTP enumeration mode. Includes both mode-specific and global flags for customizing the enumeration process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_23

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
Uses TFTP enumeration mode

Usage:
  gobuster tftp [flags]

Flags:
  -h, --help               help for tftp
  -s, --server string      The target TFTP server
      --timeout duration   TFTP timeout (default 1s)

Global Flags:
      --delay duration    Time each thread waits between requests (e.g. 1500ms)
      --no-color          Disable color output
      --no-error          Don't display errors
  -z, --no-progress       Don't display progress
  -o, --output string     Output file to write results to (defaults to stdout)
  -p, --pattern string    File containing replacement patterns
  -q, --quiet             Don't print the banner and other noise
  -t, --threads int       Number of concurrent threads (default 10)
  -v, --verbose           Verbose output (errors)
  -w, --wordlist string   Path to the wordlist
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Wordlists via STDIN in Gobuster
DESCRIPTION: Example of piping a wordlist into Gobuster using STDIN. This allows for dynamic wordlist generation or modification before passing it to Gobuster.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_25

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
hashcat -a 3 --stdout ?l | gobuster dir -u https://mysite.com -w -
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating and Using a Pattern File with Gobuster S3
DESCRIPTION: Commands for creating a pattern file from an external source and using it with Gobuster in S3 mode. This demonstrates how to combine custom wordlists with pattern files for more effective enumeration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_27

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -s --output - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eth0izzle/bucket-stream/master/permutations/extended.txt | sed -s 's/%s/{GOBUSTER}/' > patterns.txt

gobuster s3 --wordlist my.custom.wordlist -p patterns.txt -v
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Verbose Gobuster Directory Scan
DESCRIPTION: Directory scan with verbose output (-v flag) showing additional details including missed endpoints.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dir -u https://buffered.io -w ~/wordlists/shortlist.txt -v

===============================================================
Gobuster v3.2.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================
[+] Mode         : dir
[+] Url/Domain   : https://buffered.io/
[+] Threads      : 10
[+] Wordlist     : /home/oj/wordlists/shortlist.txt
[+] Status codes : 200,204,301,302,307,401,403
[+] User Agent   : gobuster/3.2.0
[+] Verbose      : true
[+] Timeout      : 10s
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:50:51 Starting gobuster
===============================================================
Missed: /alsodoesnotexist (Status: 404)
Found: /index (Status: 200)
Missed: /doesnotexist (Status: 404)
Found: /categories (Status: 301)
Found: /posts (Status: 301)
Found: /contact (Status: 301)
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:50:51 Finished
===============================================================
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Quiet Gobuster Directory Scan
DESCRIPTION: Directory scan in quiet mode (-q) with expanded URLs (-e) and disabled status codes (-n).
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dir -u https://buffered.io -w ~/wordlists/shortlist.txt -q -n -e
https://buffered.io/index
https://buffered.io/contact
https://buffered.io/posts
https://buffered.io/categories
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster S3 Mode Example
DESCRIPTION: Example command for using Gobuster in S3 bucket enumeration mode with a wordlist file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster s3 -w bucket-names.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster GCS Mode Example
DESCRIPTION: Example command for using Gobuster in GCS bucket enumeration mode with a wordlist file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster gcs -w bucket-names.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster TFTP Mode Example
DESCRIPTION: Example command for using Gobuster in TFTP enumeration mode with a target server and wordlist file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_24

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster tftp -s tftp.example.com -w common-filenames.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Detecting Wildcard DNS Configurations
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how Gobuster detects wildcard DNS configurations and stops by default to prevent false positives.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dns -d 0.0.1.xip.io -w ~/wordlists/subdomains.txt

===============================================================
Gobuster v3.2.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================
[+] Mode         : dns
[+] Url/Domain   : 0.0.1.xip.io
[+] Threads      : 10
[+] Wordlist     : /home/oj/wordlists/subdomains.txt
===============================================================
2019/06/21 12:13:48 Starting gobuster
===============================================================
2019/06/21 12:13:48 [-] Wildcard DNS found. IP address(es): 1.0.0.0
2019/06/21 12:13:48 [!] To force processing of Wildcard DNS, specify the '--wildcard' switch.
===============================================================
2019/06/21 12:13:48 Finished
===============================================================
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Forcing Wildcard DNS Processing
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to force Gobuster to process domains with wildcard DNS using the --wildcard flag.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dns -d 0.0.1.xip.io -w ~/wordlists/subdomains.txt --wildcard

===============================================================
Gobuster v3.2.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================
[+] Mode         : dns
[+] Url/Domain   : 0.0.1.xip.io
[+] Threads      : 10
[+] Wordlist     : /home/oj/wordlists/subdomains.txt
===============================================================
2019/06/21 12:13:51 Starting gobuster
===============================================================
2019/06/21 12:13:51 [-] Wildcard DNS found. IP address(es): 1.0.0.0
Found: 127.0.0.1.xip.io
Found: test.127.0.0.1.xip.io
===============================================================
2019/06/21 12:13:53 Finished
===============================================================
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster Directory Scan with Status Codes Disabled
DESCRIPTION: Directory scan output with status codes disabled using the -n flag for cleaner results.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dir -u https://buffered.io -w ~/wordlists/shortlist.txt -n

===============================================================
Gobuster v3.2.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================

[+] Url/Domain   : https://buffered.io/
[+] Threads      : 10
[+] Wordlist     : /home/oj/wordlists/shortlist.txt
[+] Status codes : 200,204,301,302,307,401,403
[+] User Agent   : gobuster/3.2.0
[+] No status    : true
[+] Timeout      : 10s
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:50:18 Starting gobuster
===============================================================
/categories
/contact
/index
/posts
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:50:18 Finished
===============================================================
```

----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Virtual Host Discovery Sample Output
DESCRIPTION: Example output of a virtual host discovery scan showing discovered subdomains.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster vhost -u https://mysite.com -w common-vhosts.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gobuster Pattern File Example
DESCRIPTION: Example content of a pattern file used with Gobuster. The {GOBUSTER} placeholder is replaced with words from the wordlist, allowing for flexible pattern matching.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_26

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
{GOBUSTER}Partial
{GOBUSTER}Service
PRE{GOBUSTER}POST
{GOBUSTER}-prod
{GOBUSTER}-dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling Base Domain Validation Warnings
DESCRIPTION: Example showing a warning when the base domain fails to resolve, but enumeration continues anyway to handle potential user input errors.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
gobuster dns -d yp.to -w ~/wordlists/subdomains.txt -i

===============================================================
Gobuster v3.2.0
by OJ Reeves (@TheColonial) & Christian Mehlmauer (@firefart)
===============================================================
[+] Mode         : dns
[+] Url/Domain   : yp.to
[+] Threads      : 10
[+] Wordlist     : /home/oj/wordlists/subdomains.txt
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:56:43 Starting gobuster
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:56:53 [-] Unable to validate base domain: yp.to
Found: cr.yp.to [131.193.32.108, 131.193.32.109]
===============================================================
2019/06/21 11:56:53 Finished
===============================================================
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Gobuster via Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Gobuster using Go's package manager. Requires Go 1.19 or later.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
go install github.com/OJ/gobuster/v3@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Gobuster from Source
DESCRIPTION: Commands to compile Gobuster from source code, including fetching dependencies and building the binary.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
go get && go build
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
go install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Gobuster via Docker
DESCRIPTION: Command to pull the latest Gobuster Docker image from GitHub Container Registry.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oj/gobuster/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker pull ghcr.io/oj/gobuster:latest
```
